name: Potion Panic (tiggy02)
description:
Something has corrupted the world and infested it with monsters! It’s up to you, the herbologist, to find what is harming the world and to stop it! Find the remaining living herbs and use their power to make potions. Many will try to stop you, but you must fight to restore peace to the land!

Potion Panic is an action-adventure game that takes you through three infinitely procedurally generated worlds, to defeat the main boss, the Corrupted Ent! You must collect enough ingredients to craft powerful potions to defend yourself!

Controls:

Mouse + Keyboard:
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Throw Potion
1/2/3/4/5 - Select Potions

Controller:
Left Stick - Movement
Right Stick - Aim
LB/RB - Select Potions
RT - Throw Potion
